stories.text: Is there a tool that shows code in a different format (alternate configurations of prettier etc. e.g. shows methods in one line instead of split at 80 char. etc.) for different devs yet all commits meet the companies coding standard. For example a plugin for VS code and a JS codebase that runs through prettier.
